column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Awesome in every aspect. The place is beautiful
column2: the service was helpful but not invasive
column3: the food was tasty and the prices accordingly to the place (around $100 for two). We had the salmon tartare as appetizer
column4: perfect flavor. Roast chicken and meatloaf as entrees with sweet potato and spinach as sides. Everything was flavorful
